game.title: The Amazing Adventure
game.synopsis: A player embarks on a quest to save the kingdom from an ancient evil.
game.beginning: You wake up in a small village, unsure of how you ended up here. The villagers tell you of a prophecy that predicts your destiny as the hero who will defeat the darkness.
game.ending: After a series of trials and battles, you finally confront the dark lord and defeat him, restoring peace to the land. As a hero, you are hailed by the people and live happily ever after.
